hotelRoomResponse.cancellationPolicy:
We understand that sometimes plans fall through. We do not charge a cancel or change fee. When the property charges such fees in accordance with its own policies, the cost will be passed on to you. Lion Square Lodge charges the following cancellation and change fees.

Cancellations or changes made before 11:59pm (property local time) on Dec 23, 2017 or no-shows are subject to a property fee equal to the first nights rate plus taxes and fees.

Cancellations or changes made after 11:59pm (property local time) on Dec 23, 2017 or no-shows are subject to a property fee equal to 100% of the total amount paid for the reservation.

Your room/unit will be guaranteed for late arrival.

Hotel supplier loyalty points and/or airline miles may not be awarded when booking Expedia Special Rate properties.

hotelTagline: Ski-in/ski-out in heart of Vail's Lionshead Village
shortDescription: Located at the base of Vail Mountain, this ski-in/ski-out lodge is near 31 area ski lifts and 193 ski runs yet near the shops and restaurants of Vail.
firstHotelOverview: Located at the base of Vail Mountain, this ski-in/ski-out lodge is near 31 area ski lifts and 193 ski runs yet near the shops and restaurants of Vail.

hotelAmenities.description: Free use of nearby fitness center

hotelAmenitiesText.name: Property Amenities
hotelAmenitiesText.content:
Lion Square Lodge is accessible to the shops and restaurants of Vail as well as to 31 ski lifts and 193 area ski runs and the Eagle Bahn Gandola is outside the door of the lodge. Amenities include a 24-hour front desk, concierge services, ski storage, ski rental shops, complimentary ski valet, and ski and grocery store shuttles in the winter. An outdoor pool with three spa tubs and a small fitness center are on site.

Complimentary wireless Internet access is available in the lobby and business center. A restaurant is also on site.

This is a smoke-free property.

  • Free use of nearby fitness center
  • Ski-in/ski-out access
  • Ski storage
  • Elevator/lift
  • Fitness facilities
  • Concierge services
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Conference space
  • Business center
  • Laundry facilities
  • Spa tub
  • Restaurant
  • Total number of rooms - 118
  • Free self parking
  • Dry cleaning/laundry service
  • Free WiFi
  • Outdoor pool
  • Smoke-free property
  • Free newspapers in lobby

hotelFeesText.name: Fees
hotelFeesText.content:
• The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.
    • Rollaway bed fee: USD 20.0 per night
  • The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

hotelOverviewText.name: Heart of Ski Country
hotelOverviewText.content: Located at the base of Vail Mountain, this ski-in/ski-out lodge is near 31 area ski lifts and 193 ski runs yet near the shops and restaurants of Vail.

hotelPoliciesText.name: Policies
hotelPoliciesText.content:
• Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No cribs (infant beds) available
  • Pets not allowed
  • Check-in time starts at 4 PM
  • Check-out time is 10 AM
  • Discover
  • MasterCard
  • American Express
  • Visa
